Instance.BindInstances: temp_U sub7_fu_199_p2 add_ln13_fu_223_p2 l2_fu_229_p2 h1_fu_271_p2 h2_fu_249_p2 sub_ln22_fu_281_p2 add_ln29_fu_319_p2 sub_ln35_fu_364_p2 l1_fu_381_p2

field.name: Enable
field.description: Master enable for the device interrupt output to the system interrupt controller: 0 = Disabled, 1 = Enabled

field.name: CHAN0_INT_ST
field.description: Channel 0 (ap_done) Interrupt Status. 0 = No Channel 0 interrupt, 1 = Channel 0 interrupt.

field.name: CHAN1_INT_ST
field.description: Channel 1 (ap_ready) Interrupt Status. 0 = No Channel 1 interrupt, 1 = Channel 1 interrupt.

table.keys: Interface, Data Width, Address Width, Offset, Register
Interface, Register, Offset, Width, Access, Description, Bit Fields
table.column: GIER, 0x04, 32, RW, Global Interrupt Enable Register, 0=Enable
IP_IER, 0x08, 32, RW, IP Interrupt Enable Register, 0=CHAN0_INT_EN 1=CHAN1_INT_EN
IP_ISR, 0x0c, 32, RW, IP Interrupt Status Register, 0=CHAN0_INT_ST 1=CHAN1_INT_ST
array_r_i, 0x10, 32, W, Data signal of array_r_i,
array_r_o, 0x18, 32, R, Data signal of array_r_o,
array_r_o_ctrl, 0x1c, 32, R, Control signal of array_r_o, 0=array_r_o_ap_vld
array_size, 0x20, 32, W, Data signal of array_size,
output_r, 0x28, 32, R, Data signal of output_r,
output_r_ctrl, 0x2c, 32, R, Control signal of output_r, 0=output_r_ap_vld

table.keys: Argument, HW Interface, HW Type, HW Info

section.name: M_AXI Burst Information
section.HEADER_NOTE: Note: All burst requests might be further partitioned into multiple requests during RTL generation based on max_read_burst_length or max_write_burst_length settings.
